title.rendered: ONE CENTRAL HCM – NEW ARCHITECTURE ICONS IN THE CENTER OF HO CHI MINH CITY

content.rendered:
One Central HCM is a luxury apartment project combining 6-star trade in services, located in the prime location in the center of Saigon: 4 fronts of Le Thi Hong Gam Street – Calmette – Pham Ngu Lao – Pho Duc Chinh, opposite Ben Thanh Market and Ben Thanh Metro Station. Around the project are prominent landmarks of the city such as: Ben Thanh Market, Art Museum, September 23 Park,… frequent destinations of domestic and international tourists.

One Central HCM comprises two towers of 47 and 56 storeys high invested by Saigon Glory Co., Ltd, Masterise Group develops the project and Newtecons is the main contractor. Two towers are interconnected by a podium and separated independently. The 56-storeys West Tower includes offices and hotels. The 47-storeys East Tower consists of apartments, with the services provided by the hotel through connecting the base and basement. Especially at base floor B1, directly connecting 2 locations with Metro Tunnel.

Known as a project owning a 6-star standard internal utility system with 9-storeys commercial center, 6-star hotels area, overflow swimming pool with panoramic view, internal park, premium spa & gymnasium area,… Along with the unique design, One Central HCM will become an architectural highlight and a symbolic work of Ho Chi Minh City after completion.
